      • DSLink

        protected DSLink(DSLinkHandler linkHandler,
                 boolean isReqOrResp,
                 java.lang.String path)
        Parameters:
        linkHandler - DSLink dataHandler
        isReqOrResp - true for requester, otherwise false for a responder.
        path - Path of the DSLink on the broker.

      • getWriter

        public DataHandler getWriter()
        The writer must never be cached as it can change.
        Returns:
        The writer to write responses to a remote endpoint.

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Returns:
        Whether the DSLink is connected or not.

        public void setDefaultDataHandlers(boolean requester,

        Sets the default data handler to the remote endpoint.
        Parameters:
        requester - Whether to handle responses.
        responder - Whether to handle requests.
